projects.title: SmartWalker (University Capstone Project)
description: Assistive walker with autonomous navigation and manual driving aid.  My contributions are listed below
Computed position using reference frame transformation and triangulation
Used OpenCV in Python for detecting ArUco markers used for positioning and navigation
PID Control of wheel motors using Arduino boards
Assisted with socket programming for Bluetooth and Ethernet connections
